parameters.name: category

parameters.description: Defaults to null

parameters.name: forum
parameters.description: Looks up a forum by ID (aka short name)

parameters.name: limit

parameters.name: order

parameters.name: query

parameters.name: since
parameters.description: Defaults to null                         Unix timestamp (or ISO datetime standard)
